paper.title: Dependency Analysis of Mobile Systems
paper.abstract: We propose an Abstract Interpretation-based static analysis for automatically detecting the dependencies between the names linked to the agents of a mobile system. We focus our study on the mobile systems written in the ?-calculus. We first refine the standard semantics in order to restore the relation between the names and the agents that have declared them. We then abstract the dependency relations that are always satisfied by the names of the agents of a mobile system. That is to say we will detect which names are always pair-wisely equal and which names have necessarily been declared by the same recursive instance of an agent.
